## stringify() function

Stringifies the given number.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function stringify(target: number, verbosity: number, format?: NumberFormat): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  target | <code>number</code> | The number to stringify. |
|  verbosity | <code>number</code> | Verbosity level. |
|  format | <code>NumberFormat</code> | Format of the number. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`string`

The stringified number.
